query.statement:
SELECT 0 AS CHK, A.PSPID, A.POSID, B.ZSITE_NM, C.ZSPEC1, C.ZSPEC2, A.STATE, C.NAMET, A.INSLFN, A.INSLFN AS FR_INSLFN, A.GBN , (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = A.INSLFN) AS INSLFN_NM, A.WRKLFN, (SELECT X.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.LFA1 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = A.MANDT AND X.LIFNR = A.WRKLFN) AS WRKLFN_NM, (A.MWBTR * 100) AS MWBTR, D.MDATE AS CNFDT, A.BLDAT, '' AS LIFNR, CASE WHEN CAST(A.BLDAT AS INT) <= 20160331 AND CAST(A.BLDAT AS INT) <> 0 THEN D.MDATE ELSE A.ZFDAT END ZFDAT , C.TEXT30 ,A.ECKEY ,A.CONF , A.DIPBXNUMB -- , CASE WHEN A.DIPBXNUMB = '00000000000' OR A.DIPBXNUMB = '' THEN '' ELSE SUBSTR(A.DIPBXNUMB,1,4)||'-'|| SUBSTR(A.DIPBXNUMB,5,3)||'-'|| SUBSTR(A.DIPBXNUMB,8,4) END AS DIPBXNUMB -- 비상통화장치 , A.DIPBXPST , CASE WHEN F.LIFNR5 <> '' THEN F.CDATE ELSE '00000000' END AS IDATE , C.ZZCHAKD , A.WRK_APL_DAT , VALUE(TRIM(T08.KWMENGT),'0') AS DAESU , L.NAME1 AS SEOLCHI_LIFNR , A.INS_DAT , '' AS INSLFN_DT , C.NAMET2 , (SELECT X.CELLP FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0001 X WHERE X.MANDT = C.MANDT AND X.POSIT = 'X' AND X.GBN = 'A' AND X.RETIF = '' AND X.LIFNR = C.LIFNR AND X.TEMNO = C.TEMNO2 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY) AS REQ_CELL , '' AS CHG_INDC , (SELECT CASE WHEN TRIM(B.STATE) = '3' THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0023 B WHERE B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.PSPID = A.PSPID AND B.POSID = A.POSID AND B.ZTYPE = '2' ) JUNGO_APPLY , DECODE(H.F_DATE,'00000000','',H.F_DATE) AS F_DATE , DECODE(H.T_DATE,'00000000','',H.T_DATE) AS T_DATE , B.ZQNTY FROM SAPHEE.ZPSTW1401 AS A INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ON A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PSPID = B.POSID INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS C ON A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PSPID = C.POSID AND A.POSID = C.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.LFA1 AS L ON L.MANDT = C.MANDT AND L.LIFNR = C.LIFNR LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0008 T08 ON A.MANDT = T08.MANDT AND A.PSPID = T08.POSID LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPST0010 AS F ON A.MANDT = F.MANDT AND A.PSPID = F.POSID AND A.POSID = F.POSID_1 LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTW0207 AS D ON A.MANDT = D.MANDT AND A.PSPID = D.PSPID AND A.POSID = D.POSID AND D.GUBUN = 'A' LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZPSTSITURM81 H ON A.MANDT = H.MANDT AND A.PSPID = H.PSPID AND A.POSID = H.POSID AND H.CHK_KIND = 'A' AND H.CHASU = '001' WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.STATE = #STATE2# AND A.GBN = 'D' AND C.ZSPEC4 NOT IN ('FT')
AND (C.ZZSHIP1 BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT#)
AND (A.BLDAT BETWEEN #ZZSHIPF# AND #ZZSHIPT#)
AND A.PSPID = #PSPID#
--AND (A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#) AND (C.LIFNR = #LIFNR# OR A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
--AND (A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#) AND A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR# -- 신청업체 기준으로 조회 (고희수 sw요청) -- AND (C.LIFNR = #LIFNR# OR A.INSLFN = #LIFNR# OR A.WRKLFN = #LIFNR#)
AND C.ZZACTSS = #ZZACTSS#
ORDER BY A.PSPID, A.POSID FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
